ComicInfo.Title: Life At Double Shots part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
On Top Of Spaghetti: A couple consider a new variation of their mutual fetish.
Mars Needs Mares: Two mares, unable to satisfy their stallion by themselves, hold auditions for new mares for the stable.
Pantie Pulp, 5 Bucks A Pound: Piggy's new attraction: Fruit drinks from fruit crushed between women's thighs.
The Dragonness In Amber: A female has a surprise for her male lover.
Life At Double Shots, Part 1: Misty gets a waitress job at a restaurant where the waitresses must wear skimpy uniforms.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:28:09. [Issue ID 226554]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kurt Wilcken,Karno,T. Grimmer,Roy D. Pounds II,Brian O'Connell,Dutch

ComicInfo.Inker: Kurt Wilcken,Karno,T. Grimmer,Roy D. Pounds II,Dutch
ComicInfo.Letterer: Kurt Wilcken,Karno,T. Grimmer,Roy D. Pounds II,Dutch
